fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When you guide a player, you will make their visit Astral. You will also temporarily remove any framing from them, and temporarily give them control and roleblock immunity.

- If your target would be controlled or roleblocked, they will not be notified. The controller or roleblocker will be notified.

- If you attempt to guide a Town Power, Mafia, or Neutral role, your ability will fail. You will not be notified of this.
